TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TemplatedControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner
Public MustInherit Class TemplatedControlDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner
public ref class TemplatedControlDesigner abstract : System::Web::UI::Design::ControlDesigner

summary.span: 扩展基于模板的服务器控件的设计时行为。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for template-based server controls.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件设计器类，它使用模板并派生自类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control designer class that uses templates and derives from the class. 若要运行示例，编译此代码，，然后在设计主机如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，在设计视图中查看的页。To run the example, compile the code, and then in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], view the page in Design view. 选择的控件，单击操作列表来选择要修改的模板，然后使用拖放功能以将控件移到模板。Select the control, click the action list to select a template to modify, and then use the drag-and-drop feature to move controls into the template. > [!NOTE] > 你的项目必须具有对引用`System.Design`程序集。Your project must have a reference to the `System.Design` assembly. [!code-csharp[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/CS/TemplateGroupsSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.aspx#2)]

span.span: if the designer document is in template mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 属性已过时。The property is obsolete. 使用等效的控件设计器功能的属性。Use the property for equivalent control designer functionality. 文档是在模板模式下时模板是当前所查看或在窗体设计器中编辑。A document is in template mode when a template is currently being viewed or edited in the forms designer.

span.span: Provides an opportunity to perform additional processing when a behavior is attached to the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 方法已过时。The method is obsolete. 使用和方法要将属性映射到样式属性。Use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnComponentChanged (object sender, System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnComponentChanged(object sender, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub OnComponentChanged (sender As Object, ce As ComponentChangedEventArgs)
public: override void OnComponentChanged(System::Object ^ sender, System::ComponentModel::Design::ComponentChangedEventArgs ^ ce);

span.span: The object sending the event.
A that provides data for the event.

summary.span: 要处理组件更改事件的委托。

span.span: Delegate to handle the component changed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改属性后，调用此方法。This method is called after a property has been changed. 它允许实施者可以执行属性更改后可能需要的任何后续处理。It allows the implementer to perform any post-processing that may be needed after a property change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnSetParent() cil managed

summary.span: 提供在此设计器的父级被更改时执行附加处理的机会。

span.span: Provides an opportunity to perform additional processing when the parent of this designer is changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTemplateModeChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 提供在模板模式被更改时执行附加处理的机会。

span.span: Provides an opportunity to perform additional processing when the template mode is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计图面中的控件上的某些操作的设计器宿主通过引发事件。The event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control in the design surface. 例如，用户进入或退出模板编辑模式的控件时引发事件。For example, an event is raised when the user enters or exits template editing mode for a control. 类提供了一个默认委托来处理事件。The class supplies a default delegate to handle the event. 类派生自重写以处理模板模式下更改关联的控件时引发的事件的方法。Classes deriving from the override the method to process events that are raised when the template mode changes for the associated control. 方法允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 默认的委托执行所需的基中的模板模式下更改事件的更新类，然后调用方法。The default delegate performs the updates that are required for a template mode change event in the base class, and then calls the method. 基中的方法类返回而不执行任何其他处理的事件。The base method in the class returns without performing any additional processing for the event. 如果类派生自和重写基方法，默认委托调用重写方法在派生类中。If a class derives from the and overrides the base method, the default delegate calls the override method in the derived class. 使用属性来确定当前编辑模式的模板中是否为控件设计器。Use the property to determine whether the control designer is in template editing mode currently.

para.span: 由提供的默认委托类执行必要之前调用基类的所有更新方法。

span.span: The default delegate that is supplied by the class performs all updates necessary for the base class before calling the method.

para.span: 重写派生自的类中的方法若要执行其他处理模板在设计图面中的控件模式更改的事件。

span.span: Override the method in classes deriving from the to perform additional processing for template mode change events on controls in the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void UpdateDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

summary.span: 更新设计时 HTML。

span.span: Updates the design-time HTML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你应调用此方法以刷新设计时显示的模板帧已经发生更改而不会调用自动更新的设计时 HTML 的方法。You should call this method to refresh the design-time display if the template frames have been changed without calling methods that update the design-time HTML automatically.
